blogs.title: Learn Spanish with me!
blogs.description: This blog will cover some basic spanish words
blogs.content:
Hola: hello
Buenos dias: good morning
Buenas noches: good evening
Habla: speak
quiero: want
carro: car
dinero: money
That's it! Adios!
blogs.author: Vo Dang
